page.title: 16Local Newspapers.
page.content: The area is well served with local newspapers, both those that are on sale and those that are given away. In the mid 1970's a new local give away paper was started-The Guardian Series- which now has at least eight different areas covered as part of its distribution network.The paper relies on advertising entirely for its funding and consequently there is rather more advertising than "news".It tends to reflect its owner's political views and as a result is biased in its values and attitudes. Papers which serve the whole area include the following;Surrey Comet, Sutton and Cheam Herald, Wallington and Carshalton Times,and the Surrey Advertiser.All these papers are on sale.The Morden News Group have recently changed to provide a free paper as a result of competion.
